data.name: World of Warships - 10 Guineas
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Keep your eye out for Guineas, a new temporary resource that you can exchange for Premium Tier VIII destroyer Cossack in the "Royal Navy" section of the Arsenal. This destroyer costs 50 Guineas.

You can collect Guineas right up to, and during, Update 0.7.12, after which point they will be converted into credits.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Keep your eye out for Guineas, a new temporary resource that you can exchange for Premium Tier VIII destroyer Cossack in the "Royal Navy" section of the Arsenal. This destroyer costs 50 Guineas.

You can collect Guineas right up to, and during, Update 0.7.12, after which point they will be converted into credits.
data.short_description: Update 0.7.9 brought a new temporary resource to the game—Guineas. If you have participated in the Royal Navy event and already earned some Guineas, now you can make good the shortfall and get the Tier VIII Cossack destroyer in the Arsenal!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
